name: 4th World Nanotechnology Summit (Worldnano-2022)
content: Phronesis LLC welcomes everyone to participate in “4th World Nanotechnology Summit (Worldnano-2022)” scheduled on September 19-20, 2022 at Miami, USA. Conference is bounded with the theme “Explore the Scientific and Technical Advances in the Field of Nanotechnology”. Worldnano-2022 comprised of varied scientific sessions which covers all frontier topics in nanotechnology. Conference Sessions Nanomaterials & Nanoparticles Nanotechnology & Nanoscience Nanoelectronics, Nanosensors & Nanodevices Nanotechnology for Environment and Energy Nano Photonics, Lasers & Optics Nanocatalysis & Applications in the Chemical Industry Advanced Material Engineering Materials Science & Engineering Bio-Materials & Bio-devices Nanomagnetism, Magnetic Materials Nanofabrication, Nanoprocesing & Nanomanufacturing Biomedical Engineering Drug Delivery and Nanocarriers Industrial Nanotechnology Nanomedicine & Life Science Nanobiotechnology 3D Characterization Polymer Nanotechnology Green Nanotechnology & Water Treatment Colloidal Nanocrystals Pharmaceutical Nanotechnology Carbon and Graphene Nanotechnology Quantum Dots & Quantum Wells Modern and Emerging Plasma Nanomanufacturing Technologies Nanofluidics Nano-Imaging for Diagnosis, Therapy and Delivery Nano Research on Covid-19 Medicine and Vaccine Nanotechnology Applications Nanotoxicology Nano Computational Modelling Nano Robotics
